As for Dong Gong Lianzhi, his name is still recorded in our family tree, and has not been removed as a rebellious descendant. He is still a member of our Eastern Palace family. How we handle him is a matter for our Eastern Palace family."

The old lady from the Eastern Palace was well aware that if they let Pei Yi take the person away, they would no longer be able to openly deal with their grandson, so even though they feared DK's influence, their attitude could not weaken.

src: “都说，他是我妹妹肚子里孩子的爸爸呢，你是年纪大了，耳朵不好使了么？”
ref: “Like I said, he’s the father of my sister’s child. Are you deaf?”
hyp: "They said he is the father of the child in my sister's belly. Are you getting old and your ears not working well?"
rel_src: 裴逸还没回答，安小柠见机行事喊了一声他，“哥哥，他是我男朋友，我现在肚子里有了他的骨肉，你不能扔下他啊。”
“老太婆，你也听见了，这位……也算是我的妹夫了，他们俩孩子都有了，把人交给你们，岂不是让孩子以后没有爸爸？”
rel_tgt: Before Pei Yi could respond, An Xiaoning took the opportunity to call out to him, "Brother, he is my boyfriend. I am now carrying his child in my belly. You can't abandon him."
"Old lady, you heard it too. This... can also be considered my brother-in-law. They already have children. If we hand them over to you, won't the children be left without a father in the future?"

src: “今天早上，当我母亲给我送有毒饭菜的时候，我就已经当场和她决断了母女关系，此前，当东宫家族的人企图将我和安小姐以及他的属下设计成意外死亡的时候，我就已经很明确了，现在虽然东宫莲止这个名字还在族谱和东宫家族的户口簿上，但是，我现在已经不姓东宫了，我现在姓吴，吴莲止是我现在的名字，我已不是东宫家族的人！”
ref: “When my mother delivered some poisoned dishes to me this morning, I had already severed all ties with her. I already knew then that I’m no longer a member of the Donggong family, although it says so in the official records. My last name is now ‘Wu.’ My name is Wu Lianzhi. I no longer belong to the Donggong family!”

new_src_summary: 本文描述了东宫老爷子遇到裴逸和安小柠的一场相遇。裴逸为了保护安小柠的身份，带着吴莲止前来，引起了东宫家族的不满和怀疑。裴逸坚称安小柠是他的妹妹，并要带走她和吴莲止，但东宫家族不同意。双方在权力和家族关系上产生冲突，裴逸展现出强硬的态度，吴莲止也表明自己已经不再是东宫家族的人。整体风格紧张充满悬疑，语气严肃、冷漠、强硬。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 1303, the old man from the Eastern Palace questions the group's actions while they wait for their ancestors to arrive. Pei Yi arrives and confronts the Eastern Palace family about their intentions towards An Xiaoning, revealing that she is carrying Dong Gong Lianzhi's child. The Eastern Palace family is shocked to learn about Pei Yi's sister's presence and Wu Lianzhi claims he has severed ties with them. Pei Yi argues that separating the children from their father would leave them without a parent, while the old lady from the Eastern Palace insists on following family rules and not allowing outsiders to interfere. Wu Lianzhi declares he is no longer a member of the Eastern Palace family, and Pei Yi challenges the old lady's plot to harm An Xiaoning.

src: 车内的吴莲止听着俩人的对话，着实是觉得，这俩人是不是有一腿？
ref: After hearing their conversation, Wu Lianzhi could not help but wonder, Are they in a relationship?
hyp: Wu Lianzhi in the car listened to the conversation between the two of them and couldn't help but wonder if they were having an affair.
new_src_summary: 本文描述了东宫老爷子遇到裴逸和安小柠的一场相遇。裴逸为了保护安小柠的身份，带着吴莲止前来，引起了东宫家族的不满和怀疑。裴逸坚称安小柠是他的妹妹，并要带走她和吴莲止，但东宫家族不同意。双方在权力和家族关系上产生冲突，裴逸展现出强硬的态度，吴莲止也表明自己已经不再是东宫家族的人。裴逸表示安小柠是一个有仇必报的人，决定带走他们俩。东宫家族的人想要反抗，但最终无奈地放弃。裴逸提出要求安小柠陪他半个月，但安小柠只同意两天，并进行了讨价还价。裴逸最终答应了五天的要求，同时表示不能让安小柠先回国。整体风格紧张充满悬疑，同时又夹杂着现代都市言情小说的轻松幽默。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 1303, the old man from the Eastern Palace questions the group's actions as they wait for their ancestors to arrive. Pei Yi arrives and confronts the Eastern Palace family about their intentions towards An Xiaoning, revealing she is carrying Dong Gong Lianzhi's child. The Eastern Palace family is shocked to learn about Pei Yi's sister's presence, and Wu Lianzhi claims he has severed ties with them. Pei Yi argues that separating the children from their father would leave them without a parent, while the old lady from the Eastern Palace insists on following family rules. Wu Lianzhi declares he is no longer a member of the Eastern Palace family and warns them against seeking revenge. Despite objections, he takes An Xiaoning away, angering the family. Pei Yi and An Xiaoning discuss a request, with An Xiaoning insisting on her freedom and limiting the time of companionship. Pei Yi agrees to five days but refuses to let An Xiaoning return to her home country first.
rel_src: “我和安小柠是打过交道的。”裴逸微微一笑，“她这个人，是有仇必报的类型，你们想要她的命，她能善罢甘休吗？”
裴逸斜她一眼，“利用完就撤？”
rel_tgt: "I have had dealings with An Xiaoning," Pei Yi smiled slightly, "She is the type who seeks revenge for any wrongdoing. If you want her life, will she just let it go?"
Pei Yi glanced at her, "Use and then withdraw?"
